name: Audioteka
description: Fetches audiobook metadata from Audioteka, a popular audiobook platform in Central and Eastern Europe.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language/region code: pl (Polish), cz (Czech), de (German), sk (Slovak), lt (Lithuanian)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 5, max: 20)

comments: Credits https://github.com/lakafior/audioteka-abs for the original implementation.
